featured.text: His father, __(19)__ always hoped that he would get a PhD and become a professor, __(20)__ with a scoff: “What is all this nonsense?!”

definition.zh_def: 無意義的話或行為；胡說八道。
definition.en_def: Words or ideas that are silly or have no meaning.
definition.example: What he said was pure nonsense and made no sense at all.
